content: **tulip headband** this is the perfect headband for spring the pattern is easily adjustable for all sizes **difficulty level ** easy/intermediate **size ** the finished headband is 13 in x 1 5 in the ties are 12 in long **materials needed ** lace weight 100% cotton cream lace weight 100% cotton green lace weight 100% cotton pink crochet hook size 2 5mm needle for weaving in ends email me at erintaylor crochets@gmail com for any questions or concerns tag me on instagram @erintaylor crochets
